info.name: SL Maps / maps.secondlife.com: Dark (Nova)
info.description: A darker look for maps.secondlife.com. For slurl.com: https://userstyles.org/styles/133823/sl-maps-surl-com-dark-nova
info.additionalInfo: Because maps.secondlife.com and slurl.com use the same selectors in different ways, I had to make two styles to get everything to work properly. Please install both for a complete look.
